title: Analysis and Practice of AI-Based Mathematics Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (functions, statistics) and awareness of fundamental AI terminology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with simple app utilization for project deliverables submission

learning_goals: They achieve a 20% improvement in mathematical problem-solving efficiency by analyzing AI educational tool applications.
They write comparative reports on cognitive/affective domain learning effects based on meta-analysis results.
They demonstrate real-world problem-solving competencies through AI-assisted mathematical modeling projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
